solution_line_template: In total, John made ${saturday_earnings} + ${sunday_earnings} + ${previous_weekend_earnings} = $<<{saturday_earnings}+{sunday_earnings}+{previous_weekend_earnings}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} over the two weekends.
John needs ${pogo_stick_cost} - ${total_earnings} = $<<{pogo_stick_cost}-{total_earnings}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} extra to buy the pogo stick.
